popover

restrict: 'AC'

NameTypeDesciption
data-popoveror popover to enable tooltip directive
data-placementleft, top, bottom, right position of the message
data-titletitle in popover
data-contentMessage in popover
class popover-success, popover-danger, popover-warning, popover-info :color options
popover-colorful : not just Title content also get colors popover-dark : darker colors
